Siamo andati un sabato nella spa dell'Armani. Molto bella la vasca idromassaggio. Il bar √® fornito di tisane, arance, mele e penso si possa chiedere anche altro. Il percorso benessere inizia con sauna, doccia, bagno turco, cascata fi ghiaccio. Consigliano ogni step 10 minuti. Vi consiglio poi di fare un massaggio rilassante. Il personale √® molto bravo e preparato e soprattutto molto gentile. La struttura √® molto accogliente ed elegante. La doccia ha una cascata perfetta in alton ed √® spaziosissima. Ci tornerei molto volentieri √® stato veramente rigenerante.Molto Consigliato per le coppie.

Bad service. Poor quality of rooms. Bad restaurant. Very unfriendly management. Would be better to avoid this awful hotel! We were requested to answer an email within 24h.. Despite the absence message, our deposit was considered as lost..

Great atmosphere in perfect shaped surrounding. Cocktails are high leveled and the sight over the city rooftops is amazing.Armani home styling could be a nice alternative to today's way of living. To recommend!!

review_title: This Hotel is PERFECTO ... I Mean it and this is why ...
review_text: This place is more than perfect as nothing really perfect, but its nice to be so close to perfection ... From walking into the main doors with great warm welcome .. they escort you to the elevator, great welcoming as soon as you get to the lobby, great staff and people.. all look great and groomed. lobby is amazing, warm and inviting to set and relax great smell and design. The rooms are amazing ... staying there with a friend, room service was great .. and Im very picky person who travel alot for my work and I hotel in all the time but picky about what hotels all about, I always look at small details here and there to complain about .. but I didnt find any with this one.. all was great .. Spa was amazing when I went there with my friend.. gym .. pool .. everything was spot on. The ambit and the smell of hotel is just right... this place got a style and luxury mixed in together very well .. and Im glad when I came to milano first time and said lets give it a try.. since then, always its my no.1 place to be at ... Im a fashion photographer always critic everything ... and this is coming from my real me as person cause this place is nothing but pleasure to be at even if you dont want to leave your room.Very central and all cafes and restaurants are near by ... as location its located in the best place ... nothing to worry about location wise.Final thoughts ... for me I will always love and attend to this hotel without thinking twice .. great management .. staff amazing .. rooms clean .. and you got almost everything you need inside .. I highly recommended from pleasure and business point of view ... Every time I tell my friends .. you must stay at Armani Hotel once you in Milano ( cause they ask alot where to stay cause I travel alot ) .. they message me from their room Ramsey " WOW " .. Thank you .I hope as you as a visitor got the information you looking for about this hotel.. its worth it.Ramsey Spencer

Nous avons s√©journ√© deux jours √† l'Armani H√¥tel de Milan pour l'anniversaire de Madame. Compte tenu de cet √©v√©nement nous avons gracieusement b√©n√©fici√© de notre chambre surclass√©e en suite des notre arriv√©e √† 11h00 le matin. L'emplacement est id√©al pour une visite de Milan √† pied ! Rien n'est laiss√© au hasard : le service est avenant et impeccable. La personnalisation est au rendez-vous et les demandes satisfaites imm√©diatement. Le design et le standing Hi tech : contr√¥le de la chambre par iPad sont tr√®s bons. Point d'attention sur le r√©glage de la temp√©rature de l'eau de la douche difficile √† obtenir. Le spa est tr√®s beau. Le seul b√©mol est le fait qu'il faisait un peu chaud √† l'int√©rieur de l'h√¥tel.... malgr√© une temp√©rature ext√©rieure de -2 degr√©. H√¥tel √† recommander !

Hotel molto comodo per spostarsi in centro.  Molto scomodo invece strutturalmente: bisogna prendere la mano per capire come arrivare al piano terra, perch√© in ogni caso si deve sempre passare per il piano dove c'√® il ricevimento. Stanza molto bella, letto comodissimo, e comfort vari molto apprezzati. Ho trovato di una scomodit√† unica tutto il sistema di gestione della stanza tramite un tablet... una sorta di domotica semza senso. Svegliarsi di notte x andare in bagno e dover cercare il tablet per accendere la luce... anche no.Abbiamo anche avuto un problema di non so che tipo per cui le luci andavano da sole. Il bagno bellissimo composto da due ambienti molto "spa".Una menzione negativa a parte per la colazione  (non inclusa nella stanza). Una colazione davvero dozzinale, scelta misera e servizio non all'altezza. Hanno dei prodotti di qualit√† medio bassa e mal presentati.Non fate la colazione qui.

Ambiente e design ..tutto parla di Giorgio Armani icona di stile ed eleganza che sono espressamente riportate nel suo omonimo hotel nella sua Milano , una Milano dal lusso glamour che qui dentro ancora vive grazie anche ai suoi ospiti internazionali e ad uno staff preparato  e cortese  . Bellissima la camera al top del confort con il pad controller e mini bar incluso , colazione eccellente e ricca di qualita' , palestra con vista sui tetti del centro . Spa con piscina che colmcalar del buio diventa un ambiente intimo e di relax . Abbiamo avuto un piccolo disguido con il trattamento prescelto ma la cortesia dello staff e della manager hanno fatto la differenza e non ha inificiato affatto l esperienza complessiva . Location perfetta per shopping e visite d arte.

Ho scelto l'Armani Hotel perch√© situato in centro e visto che mi sono recata questo fine settimana per gli acquisti natalizi, mi √© sembrato l'ideale. La struttura √® molto moderna, tutta la camera √© controllata da iPad a tua disposizione, che a volte per√≤ risulta un po' scomodo. un interruttore per la luce sarebbe stato apprezzato. La camera, noi abbiamo scelto una suite, era arredata con mobili molto sobri e datati, per il prezzo mi aspettavo di pi√π. La stanza da bagno invece √© paragonabile ad un mini appartamento, ampia, spaziosa e arredata con gusto. Peccato che il riscaldamento si attiva solo al tuo arrivo e quindi la camera risulta fredda appena entri, ed essendo in pieno dicembre avrei preferito trovarla gi√† calda e questo lo trovo un grande disguido. Le 5 stelle sono da attribuire al servizio, tutto il personale √© servizievole, gentilissimo ed nei limiti del possibile esaudiscono i tuoi desideri e ti coccolano. Peccato, speravo che con questo prezzo sarei rimasta pi√π soddisfatta.

The hotel itself is amazing and the staff super friendly and helpful. The food at the restaurant is heaven and the lounge has the best atmosphere and cocktails. We also enjoyed the amazing spa with the city views. We spend there 2 nights and we can't wait to be back....

great atmosphere, decor, perfect for either business or romantic, the bar and restaurant had incredible marble lighter decor and the best bathroom you can find in any hotel, the bed is also outstanding, the only i miss was a good garage for my Ferrari, that i will certainly will not give to the valets

review_title: Wie immer ausgezeichnet. Mailands beste Adresse
review_text: Das Armani ist und bleibt unsere Lieblingsadresse in Mailand.Auch unser dritter Aufenthalt war wie immer sehr sch√∂n. Das Fr√ºhst√ºcksbuffet ist und bleibt eines der besten weltweit und besonders in Mailand. Eierspeisen und sonstiger Schnickschnack kostet extra, was vielleicht ein Minuspunkt sein mag. Andererseits ist das Buffet qualitativ sehr hochwertig und bietet alles was das Herz begehrt. Leider ist das Personal etwas √ºberfordert, wenn das Hotel gut besucht ist und der Kaffee l√§sst somit etwas l√§nger auf sich warten.Ein St√∂rfaktor war, dass in unserer Suite im G√§stebadezimmer kein warmes Wasser lief. Allerdings wurde das Problem vom Personal umgehend behoben bzw. ein Teil ausgetauscht. Zudem funktionierten die Zimmerkarten nicht ganz problemlos, was ebenfalls etwas nervig war, da man st√§ndig die Rezeption aufsuchen musste.Trotz der Kleinigkeiten war es wieder ein sehr angenehmer und wie immer luxuri√∂ser Aufenthalt im Armani Hotel. Das Hotel- und Zimmerdesign, Fr√ºhst√ºck und die exzellente Lage direkt bei der Via Montenapoleone kann kein Hotel in Mailand toppen. Gerne wieder.

Meravigliosa esperienza! Gli ambienti eleganti ma non sfarzosi creano una bellissima atmosfera, moderna e accogliente al tempo stesso. Il personale √® delizioso, discreto e affabile. La vista dal piano alto √® mozzafiato e val la pena trascorrerci una serata anche solo per un aperitivo. Assolutamente consigliato.

We stayed here for four nights and were very pleasantly surprised when we checked in early in the morning, several hours before the official check-in,  to be told that we were going to be upgraded to the sixth floor with a room which had a balcony.  For sure, if you have the chance, the sixth floor rooms with balconies are truly superbt, offering magnificent views across the city.   Only rooms on the sixth floor have balconies.I have to say that the thing that impressed us the most about the hotel was the warmth and personal attention of the staff.  They truly went out of their way to make you feel welcome and very soon recognised you by sight and name.There were a few things though in the design of the hotel common areas and the room where we felt that form had overtaken function.  This is not to say that the hotel common areas and the room were not impressive, because they were.  For example, trying to find the bathrooms located near the public area.  The signage both as to the location and which was the gents and which were the ladies, was just simply far too subtle for us.  When I first eventually found the toilet entrance doors, I thought they were emergency exit doors because of what appeared to be the large horizontal emergency release bar, which where I come from, is only used on emergency exits.  That is in fact the handle that you use to open the door.  The bathroom itself was also a bit on the dark side and the basket for collecting the used hand towels was clearly an afterthought, as it obstructed one of the hand basins.  In the bedroom itself the lighting and room controls are extremely discreet and so subtle that you can easily miss them.  We understand this has been improved recently by the introduction of an iPad which controls everything in the room,  including lighting, air conditioning, blinds, TV etc, etc.  This is undoubtedly an improvement, but I could not find out how to leave on a nightlight.  The bathroom was very large and very pleasant.  It is however impossible to distinguish between the door for the shower and the door for the toilet and for the first day or so, this takes a little bit of getting used to.  The shower cubicle was very large but a little dark inside, even with the light built into the rainforest shower switched on.  This meant that the extremely subtle marking on the shower controls to distinguish hot and cold and the control between the various shower outlets, are just about impossible to read, especially if you need to wear glasses.Personally, if I was designing the bathroom, I would have orientated the bath arrangement so that you faced the beautiful view out through the window, rather than had your back to it, when sat in the bath.Hand basins for two, rather than one could probably have been included in the bathroom design, with a little bit of space rearrangement.I think it's very important to make it quite clear that compared to the design pluses that are too numerous to list (just for example, the excellent walk-in wardrobe/dressing room;  the excellent and complimentary minibar;  a superbly comfortable bed)  the above critical points are minor  and did not ruin our stay in any way.  Nonetheless they were points that we noted and remembered a few weeks after we had left.The location of the hotel is absolutely superb.  We were able to walk to just about everywhere that we wish to go to.  There is a and underground railway entrance next door to the hotel, a tram stop outside the hotel and all of the top shopping streets and areas are within easy walking distance, as are many excellent restaurants and tourist sites.   We were impressed by the Armani Hotel in many ways, as we were impressed by Milan which we had not been to before.  We intend to return.

Stayed one night. Delux room was well designed with huge walkin shower and nice bathroom. Very comfortable bed. Dining room service was quick and elegant with delicious risotto and burata salad. Elegant dining room for breakfast and nice choice with fresh products. Great spa.

Great location, trendy hotel, lovely bedroom with amazing bathroom BUT very noisy: we could hear everything in the room next to us (snoring, conversation, tv......) which is a real shame as it completely ruined our stay. We will choose another hotel next time because of that. The breakfast wasn't very good either. We also found that the change of lift to access the bedrooms was inconvenient (you have to take a lift from the entrance on the ground floor to access the lobby on the 6th floor then take another lift to the rooms.) Considering the choice on of 5 star hotels in the same area we will try another one next time.

La mia compagna per il nostro anniversario decide di trascorrere un breve week-end a Milano, ed in particolare all'Armani Hotel.Esperienza unica nel suo genere, tutto perfetto, incantevole!Camere accoglienti, personale fantastico..lounge bar davvero si colloca come l'esser una splendida location per un ottimo aperitivo pre-serata.Spero di ritornarci presto, un complimento a tutto lo staff!

review_title: Sehr gutes Hotel wo man sich wohl f√ºhlt !
review_text: Ein sehr sch√∂nes Hotel mit wunderbaren Zimmern und einem wunderbaren Wellness Pool. Sehr sauber und angenehm. Sehr guter Service. Tolles Fr√ºhst√ºcksbuffet und wunderbarer Bar. Toller Service, wir kommen gerne wieder.

Ospite dell'Armani Milano x lavoro... Hotel molto bello in una struttura imponente, personale gentile e professionale, camere arredate moderne con cura in perfetto stile Armani. Il ristorante sushi NOBU all'interno dell'Hotel una garanzia x chi vuol mangiare sushi di grande qualita'!!!ConsigliatissimoAlfredo

hotel eccezionale, molto lussuoso. camera enorme con tutti i confort necessari! personale molto educato, gentile e disponibile. a colazione c'√® l'imbarazzo della scelta con ottime qualit√†. anche come posizione √® ideale perch√© si trova in centro! spa a livelli molto alti.soggiornando in questo hotel non si ha pi√π la voglia di tornare a casa!

Relax, stile, eleganza. Nessuna pecca, cura nei minimi dettagli, esperienza unica per pace dei sensi e grandissima premura verso i clienti. Nel quadrilatero della moda come background, √® il posto perfetto in un angolo di citt√† fortunatamente meno caotico

review_title: Excellent hotel to stay in Milan
review_text: The staff showed excellent knowledge about the city and what is the best Restaurants and spots must see plus they would do all necessary arrangements and reservations. The room is modern and clean, room service was excellent. Would definitely stay in Armani if passing through Milan. Good value for money.

Eleganza in stile Armani. Camere pulite e molto prestigiose. Personale educato e gentilissimo. Semplicemente da vivere nella sua meravigliosa interezza! Il ristorante offre piatti ottimi nello stile dell'albergo.

review_title: Minimalista ed Unico nel Suo Genere
review_text: Grande Sorpresa scoprire questo hotel da Ospite. Unico nel suo genere del resto √® come nello stile Armani !Personale Gentile e Preparato. Posto nel Quadrilatero della Moda a due passi dal Duomo. Colazione Ottima, Ristorante Nobu tra i Migliori in assoluto. Camere ben insonorizzate ed arredate minimal. Da provare se si vuole stare al Top. Prezzi Ragionevoli in considerazione del posto, ambiente e servizi.

Il personale molto gentile e le camere sono ben curate e pulite,bellissima la piscina all'interno dell'albergo. I migliori complimenti agli staff e alla direzione, continuate cos√¨ siete grandi.Ci ritorner√≤ perch√© mi sono trovato molto bene.Lo consiglio a tutti quelli che vogliono trovare in vacanza un paradiso in citt√†.

great service the manager is very helpful of anything that you need, she knows the place very well knows all the good restaurants and their numbers and she is especially nice and friendly to your requests , great room, very good view, less noise will be nice

review_title: Excellent hotel one of the best
review_text: It is my second visit in this hotel. I come back because five years ago I enjoy very much and this time much more. The hotel offers high level service. The food is magnificent the spa is gorgeous and the people who works in the hotel are amazing. We had a great time.

Non ci sono tante parole x esprimere l'eccellenza nel servizio attento e puntuale unito ad uno stile importante e fine Consigliato per ogni tipo di occasione sia di lavoro che di svago Uno dei pi√π ben diretti hotel mai visitati negli ultimi anni

We walked in and suddenly got confused by the dearth of a reception. But that's where the world of Maestro Giorgio began because we were rapidly approached by a nice doorman who showed us the way to the lobby. Once there, we were professionally and smartly welcomed by the Lifestyle Manager Francesco who instantly looked after every single aspect of our stay and provided us all the information we needed about restaurants, tours, museums and clubs. The check in was a flash, the room was amazing (exactly what you expect when you say Armani Hotel) the restaurant was extraordinary and the food insanely good.WELL DONE!

Wir waren ein Wochenende in Mailand in diesem wundersch√∂nen und erstklassigen Hotel. Die Zimmer sind top ausgestattet. Die Bar hat uns auch gut gefallen, wobei das Fr√ºhst√ºck schon fast sch√∂ner war, von der Aussicht und der Vielfalt. Das Personal, wie immer auf diesem Standard, erstklassig. Der Spa Bereich war klein aber fein. Das Duschmittel, sowie Shampoo riecht exquisit, halt Armani... love it! Auf jeden Fall empfehlenswert, jedoch nicht gerade g√ºnstig.

Words cannot express our (my wife and I) experience at the Armani, we were on our anniversary, Everything was just perfect, the staff... all the staff was some mannered and friendly every single one polite and helpful, and as for our room (Armani Suite) very nicely decorated, and high tech, everything was linked directly to the I-pad, breakfast was very nice we had room service also ‚Äúdelizioso‚Äù and dinner  at the Armani Restaurant also  ‚Äúperfetto‚Äù, maybe expenssive but it's your momey worth.I would finish my review with a simple: "AFTER ALL IT'S AN ARMANI..."

‚Äò‚ÄôMilano mind Armani for me‚Äô‚Äô Already be in Armani Milano several times and my experience is even better and better.                                                                                                                                                                                                          The staff are lovely and so attentive, friendly smiley personnel that makes you fell comfort and important at the same time.                                                                                                                                   This time the food was amazing on a Food Michelin star level restaurant and we was there for the delicious Easter Brunch . The Bar was surrounded of cool and nice Milano and international people , a real stylish place and fun at the same time, we love aperitivo!  My lady love the SPA so I also take my extra time to join and was the best idea I had ! This is definitely the Best SPA We ever try in Italy , we had our personalize treatments ad at the end a fantastic relax overlooking the City of Milano .                                                                                                                                              The rooms are beautifully appointed, We stayed in an executive suite this time and was absolutely stunning sensation basically a luxury Armani Home.I always enjoyed the Armani and the good feeling is that I find this place even better than the previous unlike other places that tend to turn down certain standards , We have noticed that  Armani Milano does always better time to time , at least this is the felling that we noticed every time we come to Milan that  from a good stay now becomes a Great stay ! So thank you to everyone makes our stay memorable.BRAVO!Looking forward to go back soon this year as well. C.&Natalie

Ottima accoglienza e staff. Camera molto confortevole. Hotel all'insegna del relax totale. Da provare assolutamente la SPA. Carino anche il bar. Comoda la posizione centrale, a pochi metri da via Montenapoleone e a 5 minuti dal Duomo.

mi piace questo hotel sia per l'arredamento sia per l'allure che lo ricorda. posizione centralissima. il bar rimane un elemento distintivo di questa struttura. √® sempre un posto ideale sia per bere un buon te sia per un aperitivo raffinato

This hotel decorated in mostly one taupe colour is perfectly located in the heart of Milan.  Rooms and bar area all the same colour and it seems that something is missing to make it not so dramatic.  The spa is very private and relaxing.   They need help getting better shampoo and conditioner in the rooms the quality is not up to their standards.   The concierge closes the main access to the hotel at midnight and you need to ring the bell for access this is not 5 stars ?!?!?!   To many good options in Milan.  What saves this is the fantastic attitude of all the employees.

Hotel magnifique ! Design / beaut√© / chaleureux / zenitude Personnel d√©vou√© et tr√®s sympathique ...Les chambres sont raffin√©es et spacieuses.Le Spa s'ouvre sur tous les toits de Milan ... Les massages et soins sont tr√®s professionnel !Hotel digne des plus beaux palaces de Paris !

What can i say about this hotel that has not been said before. First of all, location, probably best location in Milan, specially if you are there for a short period and the primary purpose of your visit is shopping. From the moment you enter the lobby, the smell of the perfume, just takes you away. the rooms were impeccable as always, the staff were fantastic. The Spa is amazing, it is actually one of my favorite things about this property, perfect for you to relax and wine down the long day. Also this hotel has probably the best room amenities of any hotel i have ever been to.

The Milan Armani immerses its guests in sleek, clever Italian design.  The location is perfect for walking to La Scala, the Duomo, the shopping district, and several excellent museums.  The view of the Milan skyline from the upstairs reception desk (as well as the gym and the bar) is wonderful.  In light of the many comforts and amenities that the hotel offered, the price was very reasonable.  The best feature of our four-day stay was the consistently extraordinary service from the moment we were greeted by Francesco, one of the "lifestyle managers," upon entering the hotel, until long after we left, when one of the managers called to make sure that we had picked up our tickets to Da Vinci's Last Supper that they'd arranged for us two weeks earlier.  We send our thanks to the entire staff, with special thanks to Francesco, Roberta, and Ricardo for their thoughtfulness.

The staff here are very helpful and it makes difference to be greeted by friendly service. I loved the lounge at the Lobby level on the 7th floor it was just so relaxing and peaceful. I did find it slightly irritating to have to take 2 lifts to get into our room as you need to go to the lobby on the 7th floor then take another lift to your room. In our case on the 5th. The rooms are very typical of Armani style pared down neutral colours. I didn't like the panel division in our room which made the whole space appear and feel much smaller. Everything is high tech operated by sleek iPads which is fun but again annoying a receptive basis. I hated all the gadget switches as at night they had all the  marker light they not making the room absolutely dark which is what I like. I also did not like the all on one shower gel shampoo and lack of conditioner but loved their q tips and  mini bar . The one thing that frequently annoys me in great hotels is that no account is made of a place with mirror to sit to do make up and dry ones hair. Location is great

Armani Hotel Milano, has always been my preferred hotel of choice while visiting Milan, the location is excellent with alot of great shopping nearby, hotel rooms and facilities are great, armani restaurant and food quality is also well done.

A beautiful, high standard, posh hotel. Polite services, you can see that staff is making every effort. Great location. A bit lifeless, and doesn‚Äôt have the locals‚Äô buzz like Bulgari. One of only four options for the top notch international traveler in Milano: Four Seasons, Bulgari, Mandarin Oriental and of course Armani.

Nel tipico stile Armani , un'hotel design molto attento ai dettagli , ottimo lobby bar tra i migliori di Milano per un drink , le camere di ottimo livello , cos√¨ come un sevizio molto professionale fanno di questo hotel un'esperienza da provare a Milano .

Eccellente: posizione centralissima, personale professionale, servizio impeccabile, SPA straordinaria. Sono stato gi√† pi√π volte ma rimane sempre una esperienza assolutamente unica. Grazie a Matteo del ricevimento.

A localiza√ß√£o do hotel Armani √© maravilhosa, dispensando transporte pra maioria dos lugares. H√° uma esta√ß√£o de metr√¥ do lado. A Rua Montenapoleone, a Duomo e a Galeria Victorio Emanuelle s√£o bem pertos de l√°. H√° alguns restaurantes pr√≥ximos (Don Carlos, Paper Moon, Armani Caf√©). O lobby e o bar do hotel s√£o muito legais, bem modernos e descolados. O bar serve bons drinks e vinhos. Uma das atendentes do Concierge me pareceu muito arrogante, mas as demais foram prestativas. O quarto n√£o √© t√£o grande, mas √© satisfat√≥rio. Todo o controle de luzes, cortinas e temperaturas √© feito atrav√©s de iPad, o que pode dificultar a vida de quem n√£o √© adepto √† tecnologias, como os senhores mais velhos. A cama √© grande, o banheiro √© m√©dio. O caf√© √© bom. H√° um complexo de lojas da Armani ao lado e o Nobu Sushi e o Caf√© est√£o l√° tamb√©m. Localiza√ß√£o muito conveniente e pre√ßo adequado para o que oferece.

review_title: Apesar de car√≠ssimo, a experi√™ncia √© impag√°vel.
review_text: Apesar de ser um dos mais caros da regi√£o, a experi√™ncia de ficar num hotel de tamanha luxuosidade √© inesquec√≠vel. Decora√ß√£o, atendimento e instala√ß√µes impec√°veis. Mesmo em se tratando de um hotel 5 estrelas, √© definitivamente surpreendentes.

I will never forget this place as it was best ever in Milan, everything awesome in terms of location, services. I will visit them defiantly as soon as possible. In the area where you don't need even car. Duomo around markets under hotel only. I love you Armani

Many places have 5 stars banded on the outside of the building but this truly is 5 star quality. Extremely modern with impressive room features and stylish interior - my girlfriend and I did not want to leave.

Situata al 7¬∞ piano dell'Armani Hotel c'√® una delle SPA pi√π belle ed esclusive di Milano, dallo stile essenziale nella sua raffinata bellezza. Ambiente ovattato per godere di un vero relax, vista panoramica meravigliosa, piscina idromassaggio perfetta nella temperatura. I trattamenti sono eseguiti da personale discreto, cortese e molto professionale.

review_title: Great experience in the middle of Milan
review_text: It was a short 4 nights stay. We have a small suite with a window on the inside. The suite was in black style and every light and temperature is controlled via 2 ipads, one in the bed room and another one in the living room. Even the TV was connected.The reception is on the last floor next to the great bar and the breakfast room. Once you check in you go down to the rooms. It takes some time to get used to it.Most of the staff are non italians, Breakfast is very good with a view on Milano. The room is very comfortable, and most important very cozy. The hotel is very centrally located, 10 minutes walk from the large cathedral.

review_title: Modern design but lack 5 star qualities
review_text: The good: modern design, room was large and clean. They moved us to a different room when we had issues with the first one. The bad: we waited 45 minutes for our car after check out despite paying 65 Euros per night for the hotel garage: this was exemplary of how everything seems to happen in the hotel. The personnel are friendly but nobody seems to have a clue what they are supposed to be doing, the hotel management must be completely incompetent. The buffet breakfast is 3 star quality. The first room we were given was cold no matter how high we raised the thermostat, and very noisy due to the windows not being insulated. When we complained we were given a different room which was much better.

the hotel was situated in an excellent spot very close walking distance to all the amazing shops.The hotel was clean and the food quality great, the spa is nice but not outstanding with very little relaxations seats in the main area.

A very contemporary modern building with minimalist overtones. Greeted by you g men in dark suits, to a separate lift to the reception area. Corridors are dark and seemless, door entrances are flush with the walls and in cared by a change in colour/ texture. Electronic card touched to a plate in the wall opens the door. The room IS wow. My expectation was met, although the overall feel was dark, but pools of light lit the room beautifully. Fantastic bedding , furniture and writing desk, but I felt slightly confined. The bathroom was a seamless marble terrazzo masterpiece, with huge glass doors to toilet and walk in shower. Armani toiletries provided, and of course bathrobes and slippers . the bath was a good size (I'm 6'2") but I found myself in the shower more. The spa area was fantastic, a jacuzzi and modern beds to relax on . There was a restaurant but I didn't eat there. The hotel ,to me, lacked warmth, but was a very good experience. It was a well designed and superbly decorated hotel. And of course, an Armani shop underneath. If you like fashion, if you want to feel like a king/ queen , then you'll love it here. Like a living vogue magazine, Milan did not disappoint.

Good quality of stay, very well located, the bar staff were very nice. Rooms actually O thought they could be extremely unique design but it was another 4* hotel with the name armani, def. Recomend the property for any type of stay.
