Ho soggiornato all'Armani Hotel pi√π volte. L'hotel √® a mio parere il miglior hotel moderno di Milano. La posizione √® magnifica. Il servizio e il personale sono eccellenti. Non ci sono parole negative da dire. √à un hotel intelligente. Ideale per gli amanti degli hotel di nuova generazione.

very satisfied the  complete stay in the hotel, friendly staff, nice room, good facilities, really EVERYTHING was very very good. the relaxation room was my favorite place, in the center of the city a very quiete place to relax, thanks again , see you soon BACK

Top notch service during Covid All perfectVery attentive serviceNice in dining any time of the dayVery nice spa with Jacuzzi and top viewVery nice cocktails in the barPerfect location next to Monte Napoleone area

Beh, che dire, ambiente luxury, ottimi gli arredementi e le finiture, personale super qualificato , disponibile e gentile. Camera con un stile raffinato, ambienti molto spaziosi e servizi a dir poco ottimi

review_title: a shame at this price point
review_text: I created a tripadvisor account just to report on the experience I had at the armani hotel in milan vs other hotels I stayed at recently: the occasion of stay was a couple night out at la scala for an opera, on the way back from Venice where we stayed at the Aman.For reference I have previously stayed at the Armani in Dubai and eaten in the Paris Armani restaurant and they were pleasurable experiences- room was a junior suite, budget 1'000‚Ç¨ plus- location is good- suite size is ok, bathroom of good size- design of interest but wear and tear are very present- technology is completely outdated and inoperative mostly:1. the room was cold, putting the temperature up didn't fix it - a member of staff had to come and do something in the background2. internet access doesn't work on most websites - error message saying the the browser system is not compatible3. youtube doesn't work either4. terrible basic sound system 5. you click for spa service - that just makes staff call you backthen the service:- my wife wanted a face mask - they was no availability but neither were they able to sell a face mask - they recommended that we walk out of the hotel and into the armani store next door to go buy one!!! when I said no, go for me, they went- breakfast side orders were not delivered despite ordered online- when leaving our luggage couldn't be found because "the room system had switched itself on privacy mode" and they hadn't picked up my luggagethe worst of all: when calling 3 times to get a manager the answer was : no one is availableI requested a partial reimbursement upon departure, then a manager called me asking to explain my story a fourth time, I was in a store, requested to be called later and never heard of anybody again, not even a sorry message.As I heard from other people this is a (aging) branding exercise not a luxury hotel

l‚Äôhotel Armani √® semplicemente una esperienza unica. Ho soggiornato soltanto una notte nella meravigliosa suite Milano al sesto piano. Tutto lussuosamente perfetto! Letto , camera, bagno e servizi impeccabili. Stupenda la vista dalla terrazza. Accoglienza chic con champagne e delizie. La colazione ottima.

Il migliore albergo di Milano. Siamo oltre al significato di lusso. Camere grandi e confortevoli. Meglio di cos√¨ non si pu√≤. Armani √® ARMANI. Per chi cerca il meglio consiglio vivamente questa struttura.

Serata all‚ÄôArmani ristorante. Ambiente sofisticato, bella location, personale molto gentile, disponibile e super attento.Abbiamo optato per il menu segua stazione da 6 portate ( ‚Ç¨ 130 a persona) Ci hanno servito 3 antipasti, 2 primi e un secondo. Tutto veramente buono, curato nel minimo dettaglio.

Dopo aver soggiornato all‚ÄôArmani Hotel di Dubai ho scelto di testare anche quello di Milano e devo ammettere che Armani Hotel non delude mai le aspettative. La tipologia di camera scelta era una Premier vista cortile interno per una maggior quiete. Giudizio complessivo della camera : eccellente! pulizia e service ineguagliabili.Nonostante ci sia stato un disguido in spa devo ammettere che lo staff si √® prontamente adoperato per risolvere il problema al meglio confermando di essere un hotel 5 stelle lusso. Quando, al momento del check out, provi un senso di nostalgia significa che il soggiorno trascorso √® stato cos√¨ piacevole che non vedi l‚Äôora di ritornare!

This is a Fantastic hotel and fantastic staff all around in the middle of Milan, central to everything via walking of by car or tram. Have always wanted to visit Milan and the Armani Hotel made it the best location for my first visit to the NYC of Italy.

I love your property and book it whenever I come to town for my business trip, the service is wonderful and friendly, eager to help with a smile.  I appreciate the attention to detail have a lovely day

We had a very pleasant stay. The service is excellent and the hotel staff very accommodating. The rooms are clean and have a very spacious layout. The mini-bar is already included in the price.All in all this hotel is absolutely recommendable!

Ci sono stato spesso per l'aperitivo  ed ogni volta sono uscito pi√π soddisfatto della volta precedente. Tutto veramente perfetto. Il personale √® molto professionale e riesce sempre a capire e soddisfare le esigenze di ogni cliente.

Eccellenza , eleganza e tanto comfort con Personale Gentile e disponili ( cosa rara )Ringrazio tutto lo staff per il soggiorno Ci rivedremo presto Vi ricord√≤ che il prezzo √® adeguato all‚Äôofferta !Grazie

siete il massimo di tutto, abbiamo trovato confort da tutti i punti di vista, quando si parla di qualita' elenganza, raffinatezza,non si puo' fare altro che parlare di Armani, in questa struttura si vive in un altro mondo, ogni qual volta mi trovero' a venire a milano sarete il mio alloggio fisso..... GRAZIE GRAZIE GRAZIE DI CUORE
Beautiful Hotel, Professional and Friendly staff. Great Location.Nice Breakfast . Great Bar, drinks and snacks.Walking  distance to Fashion, Duomo, shopping and restaurants.Reception is very helpful.

Entrare all‚ÄôArmani hotel , √® come dimenticarsi del presente e catapultarsi nel futuro, con le sue linee moderne , eleganti , ma non scontate . L‚Äôaria che respiri ti fa dimenticare di essere in una grande citt√† come Milano.Tram, traffico , clacson ... nulla. Il silenzio .L‚Äôambiente non ti indispone assolutamente alla cena del suo ristorante , ma anzi , ti accompagna ad un momento fantastico.Piatti equilibrati , alla vista ed al gusto .Da provare senza alcun dubbio.Classe ed eleganze nella forma pi√π semplice che io abbia mai visto.

As always, a flawless experience in a perfect location in Milano. Given that the temperature outside was 36 degrees when we visited, the convenient location directly next to Monte Napoleone and the subway was a bigger plus than it is already with normal temperatures.

Absolutamente fant√°stico! Tudo! Conforto, beleza, cuidado do staff, organiza√ß√£o do hotel, disposi√ß√£o do quarto, pequeno almo√ßo, gin√°sio e piscina. Tudo absolutamente pensado e preparado com gosto e com harmonia. Um pequeno peda√ßo do para√≠so na terra. Localiza√ß√£o √≥ptima tamb√©m, mas √© irrelevante, ficaria bem em qualquer s√≠tio do mundo. Parab√©ns Armani..

Excelencia total. Instalaciones, servicio, atenci√≥n, seguridad, lujo, alimentos... Todo magn√≠fico. Este elegante hotel de lujo, situado en el hist√≥rico barrio milan√©s de Brera, se encuentra a un minuto a pie de la estaci√≥n de metro de Montenapoleone y a 12 minutos de la catedral de Mil√°n.Las habitaciones y suites, elegantes y de estilo contempor√°neo, fueron dise√±adas por Giorgio Armani y cuentan con Wi-Fi gratis, televisi√≥n de pantalla plana y art√≠culos de higiene personal de dise√±o. Las habitaciones y suites superiores disponen de sala de estar; algunas de las suites incluyen adem√°s caracter√≠sticas lujosas como cine privado o gimnasio. Servicio de habitaciones disponible.Entre los servicios se incluyen desayuno y aparcamiento por un cargo. Hay un elegante restaurante y un sofisticado bar, ambos con vistas panor√°micas de la ciudad. Tambi√©n hay un spa, un gimnasio, una piscina cubierta y un centro de negocios.

Soggiorno fuga di una notte. L'hotel √® elegante, super tecnologico, con un'ottima posizione. Le stanze sono pulite, il personale INTERNO √® competente e gentile. Peccato che mi abbiano consigliato un salone di parrucchieri ove ho fatto la piega PEGGIORE della mia vita (lavaggio capelli da persona incompetente e ustione della cute e cio√® una vera TRAGEDIA). Spero che non lo utilizzino anche a domicilio nell'hotel. In tal caso, consiglio vivamente di cambiare.Per il resto siamo al TOP.

Yesterday night, I went to Armani Hotel Milano with some friends for an aperitif. We had a really warm and kind welcome at the entrance in Via Manzoni by a guy called Andrea (I think this is his name) who showed us the way to the Bamboo Bar. We had really fun moments while taking our aperitif... and what an amazing bar!!! We will come back for sure, amazing service!!

Sono stata in questo hotel il mese scorso, devo dire ottima accoglienza staff gentile...Ristorante con piatti tipici della zona accompagnati da vini di altrettanta sapidit√† ...se passer√≤ per Milano ritorner√≤ senz'altro . .

Mooi Hotel midden in Milaan. Alles elektronisch en strak geregeld. Vond het vrij donker, weinig sfeer. Parkeren van de auto was slecht geregeld voor een hotel uit deze prijs categorie. Eten was super zo ook de bediening en service.

Great coming back after some time finding the place in best shape ... great service, cosy rooms, the Spa in good condition, the restaurant and bar nice as always, also good and helpful service at the entrance

Luxus HotelI Love itBig roomsAll armani Furniture Luxus purNice Ambient Modern minimal In the Center Shopping evry where Spa Nice Restaurant And Nobu The same House Dog friendly We recomend this Hotel

We went to Milano for a long weekend and were looking for a 'special hotel treat' for ourselves. The ARMANI hotel is how a hotel should be - we assume that the name giver has probably collected all the experience he made in his life at all the hotels in the world and used this as the 'guideline' for his own version.The rooms are spacious with all the things you need, the bed is extremely comfortable with special lining from various parts of the world, bathroom stunning and all items are in the Armani style.The hotel rooms are quiet which is not always the case even in 5* hotels as the rooms have their own little lobby which provides as well noise insulation. The housekeeping staff moves and works quietly and the doors/elevators etc seem to work without any sound.Common areas such as restaurant, breakfastroom, bar etc are comfortable and well designed and offer huge variety.Location is central and in walking distance to La Scala, Shopping district and Dome.A hotel as a hotel should be...

Nobu'nun altƒ±nda da Milano'nun √ºnl√º gece kl√ºplerinden Armani Prive var. Otelde konaklarsanƒ±z mutlaka ziyaret edin. SPA ve spor merkezi de en son yeniliklere sahip.

Superbe h√¥tel situ√© en plein c≈ìur de Milan √† 5-10 min √† pied de la plazza del duomo.Il offre des prestations au look futuriste et √† la d√©co masculine. Nous √©tions dans une suite qui se compose d‚Äôun coin salon, d‚Äôune partie chambre et d‚Äôune tr√®s grande salle de bains. Le petit d√©jeuner √©tait compris dans notre r√©servation. Il est tr√®s bien pr√©sent√© et le buffet est de qualit√©.Les prestations sont haut de gamme et le personnel √† l‚Äô√©coute et disponible.Nous avions une voiture et l‚Äôh√¥tel propose de garer votre v√©hicule le temps du s√©jour. Comptez 65‚Ç¨/jour.Vous avez la possibilit√© (et je vous le conseille) de prendre un verre au Armani bamboo bar. Endroit branch√© pris√© par la jeunesse Milanaise.Si vous rechercher un h√¥tel qui sort de l‚Äôordinaire avec des prestations haut de gamme je vous conseille fortement le Armani Hotel

review_title: Beautiful hotel and superb service especially pascalque
review_text: We had a great time at Armani hotel in 304. The spa is outstanding and has a beautiful. View. We had breakfast at Armani Resturant and PASCAL was really helpful . Thanks to people like pascal the hotel is outstanding. The minestrone soup was outstanding. Even if you don‚Äôt stay surely visit the Resturant.

review_title: Excellent property....but scope of improvement in services
review_text: It‚Äôs an excellent property.Very well located right in the middle of the fashion district.Ultra luxury, but need more focus on service.Small things like moisturiser in bathroom was missing.3 people staying in the room and bathroom amenities only for 2 people.Can do better on the menu at the restaurant.Breakfast service on day 1 & 2 was excellent by day 3 was average.Concierge services were great.

The hotel is really great.Design, Atmosphere, Front Desk.It‚Äôs a pity the hostess in the restaurant sent my wife in Christmas dinner back to room because she wore new  shoes from a design boutique in Via della Spiga in Milan.She called it ‚Äúsneakers ‚Äú...Besides that, everything was perfect.One of the best hotels I‚Äôve ever stayed.

review_title: Fantastico Accoglienza Top - Hotel molto elegante e raffinato. Camere spaziose e arredate con gusto
review_text: Perfatta Location per visitare Milano e visto il periodo Natalizzio,anche per lo Shopping. Bellissiama accoglienza da parte del Ricevimento e del Direttore. Brava anche Ilaria per l'organizzazione dell'evento, piccolo ma molto importante.Colazione meravigliosa, cena buonissima. Ottimi Vini, lista vini molto ampia .Camere molto belle e spaziose, confortevoli arredate con gusto,apprezzatissime anche le amenities.

This was a treat for our anniversary.I asked for a car to pick us up form the airport. All done / very easy.I asked for a top floor room. All done and had a free upgrade to a premier room (I didn‚Äôt ask for one so that was a nice touch). We ate in the bamboo bar and Michelin star restaurant. Both excellent. All staff flawless.This is a genuine five star hotel.

Armani Hotel is modern, slick, prestigious and in a perfect location, but it's clearly overpriced and leaves you with some bitter when you expect a perfect hotel service.Perfect to hang out, but to stay in central Milan you got better alternatives for much less.

La mia vosita a Milano √® stata per la mia passione per la moda e appeoposito di ci√≤, per lo shoppingüõçL'hotel √® stato magnifico e offre magnifiche camere, un ottimo servizio e tutte le disponibilit√† che tu necessitiLa struttora offre di un magnifico e innovativo sistema tecnologico il cui collega tutta la stanza con un semplice ipad La pulizia √® eccezionale, la riservatezza che l'hotel offre non mi era ancora capitata, in 10 anni che viaggio, prima di visitare questo hotelIl wi-fi √® gratuitoLo consiglio per chi vuole godersi una piacevola e una vacanza al centro di MilanoüåÜüåå

have had my very positive and luxurious dreams about the name of ARMANI, which has become an horrible experience after this trip.I felt like i was in cheap Hollywood Movie stage where the front of the buildings are superior with an absurd odd rear end. Room was super tight and small that made me feel that there is lack of oxygen. I stayed in a 50 m2 room with a feeling of 15 m2 due to an horrible architecture i even had to open my luggage in a bathroom  Everything in the room was very old and has never been taken care since the first day. I have to admit that i am an often traveller and always stay in upscale hotels all over the world. I have missed my stays in other Milan hotels that i will not mention name's here. But listen, one good thing is that you made me become a Trip advisor member ! And No More Armani Forever !

We had an amazing stay at Armani. It is such a cool and stylish hotel. Everyone treated us extremely well. I would especially like to mention the breakfast. It felt very luxurious and with nice ambiance. I liked the fact that you were able to order something from a la carte list. That adds an extra value. Location is also excellent, right on fashion district.

The hotel stay was 5 star from reception to departure Furnishings and decor very trendy and uncluttered Staff were attentive the food was excellent and our room very modern with great facilities Attention to detail was fantastic

Einrichtung einfach top. Exklusive Materialien, Spa und Fitness traumhaft mit Sicht suf den Dom.Service gut und freundlich. Die Lage ist sehr zentral. Im gleichen Haus das Nobu Restaurant: erste Klasse

Bello elegante meraviglioso e maestoso questi sono gli aggettivi che si addicono a questa meraviglia location dove sembra di immergersi in un sogno unico e divinamente eccezionale. Lo consiglio a tutti coloro che vogliono vivere un sogno indimenticabile

Struttura scelta per un viaggio di lavoro. Ho avuto modo di vivere poco la struttura, essendo occupato per gran parte della giornata ma ho notato molta professionalit√† nella gestione del cliente e un know how da parte del personale che a questi livelli spesso si da per scontato ma che non √©  invece riscontrabile da tutte le parti.Buone le amenities in camera. Da migliorare il set di cortesia.

Ho trascorso una notte in questo hotel meraviglioso. Consiglio la camera 604, perch√® gode davvero di uno splendido panorama su Milano. Posizione comodissima alla metropolitana, linea gialla e fermata Montenapoleone (3 fermate da Milano Centrale). Buono il ristorante, gentile il personale, la linea wifi funziona bene cosi come il controllo della camera dall'iPad. Potete regolare le luci, ordinare del cibo in camera, scegliere film, musica o tv.Il bagno pulito, colazione continentale e scelta di dolce e salato. Buona. Da ripetere!

review_title: Dove il lusso sposa la cortesia
review_text: sono stato per lavoro a Milano e devo essere sincero ho vissuto in questo hotel una bellissima esperienza personale cortese camere ottime fanno diventare un semplice soggiorno come un'esperienza unica

We stayed at Armani just for a day for transit but will recommend to all luxury travelers. A to Z Armani and they stand by it . The staff in fornt office is very alert and helpful. The staff in restaurant is reversed and gives good privacy but lack promptness in service. The location is well in city . Beds are very comfortable and toiletries are amazing!

super location , rooms and food had a great time. fallen in love with their user friendly room automation systems best so far ever used... great offers for American express platinum card holders one of the major reasons i picked up this hotel.
Ë∫´ÁÇ∫‰∫ûÊõºÂ∞ºËÖ¶Á≤âÔºå‰æÜÂà∞Á±≥Ëò≠‰Ωè‰∫ûÊõºÂ∞ºÈ£ØÂ∫ó‰πüÊòØÁêÜÊâÄÁï∂ÁÑ∂ÁöÑ‰∫ã„ÄÇÈ£ØÂ∫óÂ∞±‰ΩçÊñºÊãøÁ†¥Â¥ôÂ§ßÈÅìËµ∑ÈªûÔºåË®≠Ë®àÂÖÖÊªø‰∫ûÊõºÂ∞ºÂºèÁöÑÁ∞°Á¥ÑÈ¢®Ôºå‰æÜÁ±≥Ëò≠‰ΩèÂ∞±Â∞ç‰∫Ü!

Sono stato in questo hotel e devo dire che √® stato tutto tremendamente perfetto....ho soggiornato in una bellissima ed eleganze suite con una vista mozzafiato,una stanza curata nei minimi dettagli dalla saponetta all servizio che dispone la camera....accolto con frutta e cioccolatini.....sono stato anche a cena nel ristorante Armani lo consiglio vivamente a tutti quelli che cercano lusso,raffinatezza e buon cibo.....INSOMMA UN SOGGIORNO PERFETTOGRAZIE STAFF ARMANI MILANO

I normally try to stay in classic hotels as opposed to modern hotels given a choice.  I was extremely happy that I chose to stay in the Armani Hotel Milano.The exterior of the building doesn't do it justice.  It is a somewhat non descript modern building without any particular character.  Once you steps though the doors, that all changes.The hotel staff are extremely helpful and friendly.  They went out of their way to make us feel at home and comfortable.  The lobby is not particularly interesting, but well staffed and efficient, and with service with a smile.  The Armani scent was omnipresent throughout the hotel, and was very welcome.The bar has wide vistas, and nice music and drinks.The room was amazing!  The bed very comfortable, the bathroom spacious and provided every modern convenience.  Complimentary drinks and snacks are a nice touch.  The toiletries are Armani with a clean woodsy scent.An ipad controls automation throughout the room, and while it is interesting and effective, I may have preferred standard room controls.The location is a 7 minute walk to the center of Brera and not much more to the Duomo.  Perfectly situated for those that like to walk around the center of town.I would definitely return to the Armani Milano.

In the heart of Milano, that sumarieses it all! Nevertheless...I loved how the interior materials were arranged, provoking the tactile senses. The bar on the top floor was the perfect place great view and feal! Keep it up!

Very nice atmosphere, at the front bar just before dinner had aperol amd listened to nice jazz live music .Good for drinks before dinner.I really liked the place and i enjoyed my time at the bar listening to good music .

Per il mio compleanno dei 40 anni ho ricevuto in regalo da mio marito una notte da favola presso questo hotel meraviglioso. Servizio eccellente di alto livello e al di sopra delle nostre aspettative.Camera perfetta e dotata di ogni comfort.Staff molto preparato e gentile. SPA da sogno, con panorama indimenticabile sulla vecchia Milano. Colazione molto varia e ricca.

Apprezzato il profumo nell‚Äôaria, la qualit√† del cibo, il minibar incluso, lIPad in camera con tutte le info, il balcone e le amenities firmare anche le tisane!!Breakfast deludente poca scelta e non entusiasmante Inoltre non rimpiazzata Camerieri non all‚Äôaltezza di quelli della cena palestra ok un po‚Äô caldaLa spa all‚Äôultimo piano, la piscina piccola ma molto panoramica, spogliatoi non curati le ciabatte riciclate!! nessun amenities X capelli ecc... e piccoli Cena ottima

Mio marito ed io abbiamo deciso di festeggiare l'anniversario di matrimonio in questo albergo e non potevamo fare scelta migliore. L'accoglienza, l'attenzione al dettaglio e la premura di tutti i dipendenti hanno reso ancora pi√π speciale il nostro giorno. Petali di rose sul pavimento, candele, una torta meravigliosa decorata con fiori freschi, una vista mozzafiato sia dalla camera che dal ristorante, persino un pensierino per le nostre gemelline, insomma tutto perfetto. Assolutamente consigliato!

The hotel is very well design and has great technology inside the room. The staff is super friendly and at all times and they explain everything you need to know about the services. Definitely coming back...

Amazing Hotel exceeded our expectations from the moment we arrived The staff are incredible Nothing is too much trouble The room is breathtaking Electronic system very thrilling All the facilities work by this method A mini suite almost The room had a lobby it was huge The bathroom was stunning The best hotel we have ever stayed in We had the pool area to ourselves every day Not crowded at all The hotel is immaculately presented Marble floors gorgeous furniture True luxury with a relaxed professional feel as the staff are trained to the highest level  The Spa staff and the reception staff in particular made us feel very much at home and relaxed A wonderful stay

Armani knows how to create an unique experience for your stay. Really different from all the hotels I stayed before. I loved the style and mood created in the hotel. Room was better as expected. Service was excellent. Staff was friendly, kind and very helpful. Location is right in the fashion district.

amazing hotel with excellent room , very clean &quite , very high technology but was not clearly explained  . I loved the look of the doors mostly  they only need to improve their breakfast and concierge services.

review_title: Always as good as the last time!
review_text: Have been staying at the Armani Hotel on a frequent basis the last four years. Continues to strive for improvement in all areas. Very special experience and the staff is what makes the difference.  Our home in Milan. Thank you Armani...

I absolutely love this property in the heart of the best shopping district in Milan.  It's incredibly chic, and perfect for those who love minimalist decor and expect top customer service.  The staff is incredibly helpful, the spa is fantastic, the room (and bed & sheets) are top of the line.  I highly recommend the Armani Hotel and will be recommending this property to clients.

Well located in the center of Milan, the Armani hotel does make up to expectations. Friendly staff and great infrastructure. The rooms are comfortable and nicely appointed the iPad controlling lights blinds and all the rest is a bit of a gimmick but cool none the less. The bathroom is spacious and perfectly laid out and the Armani amenities are a treat. Pricey but recommended

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay and cannot think of any faults with this hotel.The staff were warm and friendly.The room was perfect and well appointed. Everything was so thoughtful!Breakfast was amazing.Gym was well equipped And location was very convinient

In occasione di un evento calcistico a Milano ho soggiornato qui cn la mia ragazza regalandoci un fine settimana di completo totale relax!!!che dire tutto secondo i piani la qualit√† c‚Äô√® ed √® tanto prezzi giusti!!!fantastico!!

I stayed recently for a couple of nights, the proprty has the most incredible smell. If your a fan of Armani fragrances, you will love this hotel. The Hotel baffles you in a good way, you take the elevator to recption, which you assume would be on level 1, but its actually level 7 - all the bedrooms are on the floors below. The concept behind this is to give fabulous views from reception and the restaurant across Milan.The bedroom was just total luxury, the smell, accessories and bathroom. The cafe was expensive, but delicious - the spa is pure luxury and based on the 8th floor with incredible views of Milan.

Avalia√ß√£o geral excelente.A localiza√ß√£o e √≥tima, perto de todos os pontos tur√≠sticos importantes. A decora√ß√£o e linda, elegante e bem minimalista. Ficamos num quarto bem espa√ßoso, estiloso, com banheiro impec√°vel. Todo automatizado. Os amenities do banheiros s√£o Armani e bem gostosos.O mini-bar √© liberado, com caf√© Nespresso, snacks, ch√°s. A academia e excelente, equipamentos novos e vista linda. A piscina do Spa e sensacional.O bar do hotel e super movimentado √† noite, com drinks gostosos, m√∫sica boa e ambiente legal. Wi-Fi funciona super bem. N√£o fomos para o caf√© da manh√£ e nem para os restaurantes do hotel. Valeu a experi√™ncia!!!

Excelente hotel, con un trato de primera, cuartos incre√≠bles con todo tipo de servicios , moderno y cosmopolita. los ba√±os son amplios y las camas son s√∫per c√≥modas . ubicaci√≥n excepcional a dos pasos del centro.

Visited the bar only. Came for a few drinks during the day. The bar is amazing. Very nicely decorated and so classy. Staff are friendly and have a great knowledge of drinks available. Would recommend when in Milan.

I was there for the second time on Saturday 17th of March and was just amazing! I love every single thing there... service, design, food, the room and the bed!! I would repeat and repeat! Thanks again!

eccellente, dal design dell'hotel ai servizi che offrono, dalla gentilezza del personale al cibo; E come ben si sa la qualit√† si fa pagare ! , dunque √® inutile lamentarsi per i prezzi alti, l'Armani vale ed √® accessibile solo per una certa fascia !

In perfetto stile Armani un eccellente hotel che declina l‚Äôeleganza ed il servizio nei toni misurati e mai chiassosi che rappresentano questo brand dagli anni ‚Äò80.Arredi e facilities semplici ed al contempo sofisticati, personale preparato ed accogliente, cortese ma non invadente.Ottimi servizi aggiuntivi tra la spa ed i ristoranti anche questi ad ottimi livelli.Value for service !

I have stayed for 3 nights in the hotel. I had a beautiful suite, went to the spa for massage. I choose a woman and I did not really like it. Better ask for Male. You will enjoy the breakfast for sure and you should absolutely try the restaurant. I will post the pictures. Very tasty food. The concierge is very kind and helpful. The hotel is on a high level, very modern, with a gym. Only little suggestion. The housekeeper and mini bar services are coming to the room, that I did not even hear them coming. They were disturbing me 3 times per day, by waking me up walking in when I‚Äôm taking shower etc. It should be absolutely changed. What I did not like is that the hotel is very dark inside. Therefore score 4

Hotel muy bien situado en el central de Mil√°n. Junto a Montenapoleone. Moderno. Habitaciones amplias y bien dotadas. Ba√±o amplio. El servicio podr√≠a ser algo mejor. Buen estado de conservaci√≥n. Algo ruidoso por la noche. Se oye un poco el sonido del bar de copas

Hotel de sobria exquisitez. Muy confortable, detalles precisos. Ambiente cosmopolita y super atractivo, Spa impresionante. Atenci√≥n extrema en cuanto a personal y detalles perfectos. Exquisito en todos los aspectos.

Nel cuore di Milano l‚ÄôArmani rappresenta una ottima scelta per chi cerca lusso e modernit√†, i lounge posti all‚Äôultimo piano e la discoteca nei sotterranei completano l‚Äôofferta per una clientela ricercata ed esigente

Ho passato un weekend con la mia amica davvero magico. Lo staff √® stato super premuroso, disponibile e davvero gentilissimo. Menzione speciale per Angela e Mario che non ci hanno fatto mancare nulla. L'hotel un vero gioiello.La camera era molto luminosa e ben insonorizzata. Il bagno grande e moderno. La vista su Milano lascia senza fiato. l'unica nota che mi sento di fare riguarda l'asciugacapelli lasciato in dotazione. Se avete i capelli lunghi consiglio di attrezzarvi diversamente.La colazione √® divina, sia per la qualit√† del cibo che per la selezione.La spa √® piccola ma perfetta per chiudere una giornata regalandosi una coccola e del sano relax.

Est√° ubicado en un complejo conocido como Armani World donde TODO es Armani, los chocolates, el azular, la ropa, todo se controla desde el iPad y es un gran hotel, tiene buen servicio y est√° muy bien en relaci√≥n precio/calidad.

review_title: Angenehmer Aufenthalt im Zentrum von Mailand
review_text: Freundlicher  Empfang bei Ankunft. Deluxe Zimmer was relative klein, kaum Bewegungsfreiheit. Modern, aber dunkel eingerichtet. Kleiner Balkon mit Sitzgelegenheit zum Innenhof. Sehr zu empfehlen, da die Ger√§uschkulisse zur Strasse hin sehr laut ist. Rezeption war sehr hilfreich bei Buchung eines Restaurants.

Immobile ristrutturato divinamente. Attenzione ai particolari. L'albergo √® lo specchio dell'anima di chi lo gestisce e si tratta di un'anima sensibile e con un importante back ground consigliatissimo da tutti i punti di vista

review_text: No me gust√≥ la comida, no me sorprendi√≥ a pesar de tan Elevado precio. No me gust√≥, no volver√≠a a comer ah√≠ dentro del hotel, me gust√≥ el spa, muy personalizado, me sent√≠ a gusto en el spa solo para mi

Wir hatten an einem Wochenende im November das Gl√ºck im Armani Hotel f√ºr eine Nacht zu √ºbernachten. Mit dem Romantik Packet kamen wir neben einem exquisiten Abendessen, dem grandiosen Fr√ºhst√ºck auch in den Genuss des Spa mit tollen Anwendungen. Zu guter letzt k√∂nnten wir das Zimmer bis 15h am Folgetag halten. Allerdings sind knapp 1300‚Ç¨ schon sehr happig - jedoch jeden Euro wert wenn man einmal f√ºr 24h in den Luxus dieses Designtraumes Abtauchen m√∂chte. Die Minibar ist zu diesem Preis ebenfalls enthalten ;-) Das Personal ist sehr zuvorkommend und begleitet die ahnungslosen und mitunter √ºberforderteren G√§ste zu jeder gew√ºnschten Destination. Etwas ungewohnt ist die Lobby im 7 Stockwerk und der Lift Wechsel wenn man in sein Zimmer m√∂chte die alle unterhalb liegen. Absolut empfehlenswert

Che dire, non c'√® niente che non sia perfetto, la mia sensazione ogni volta che torno √® quella di sentirmi a casa. La gentilezza del personale, la pulizia, la qualit√†. la posizione....... insomma credo non si possa desiderare altro.

The location couldn‚Äôt be better, the view from above is amazing. Staff is very friendly and ipad in room is highlight. We could check in earlier. Breakfast is ok. It is very quiet. We loved the emporio cafe.

Thoroughly enjoyed the friendly, helpful service throughout the hotel.Beautifully appointed hotel, fantastic views and the spa is peaceful and elegant.I was treated by Rossella in the spa. Very professional and knew exactly what to do for my injury.Highly recommended.

Ho alloggiato una notte qui col mio ragazzo. Oltre alla bellezza dell‚Äôambiente, curato nei minimi dettagli sia nelle stanze che nei luoghi condivisi (ristorante, lounge, spa), ho trovato un personale molto disponibile e attento. Per non parlare della cena.. mai mangiato e bevuto cos√¨ bene. Il sommelier e il cuoco sono stati molto disponibili ad accontentare i miei gusti particolarissimi. Stessa cosa per quanto riguarda i drink in lounge. Le camere sono spettacolari e fornite di tutto ci√≤ che pu√≤ servire ad un cliente. Siamo stati davvero bene e ci siamo sentiti coccolati per tutta la permanenza.

We had the best stay in Milano ever at Armani Hotel. Perfecly located next to cuadrilatero de la moda, all restaurants recommended were walking distance as also high end shops and the most important monuments as the Duomo and the Scala Theatre.The room big and peaceful made us rest magnificent, we didn't wanted to leave. Will be back for sure!

Sehr schickes, luxuri√∂ses an bester Lage gelegenes Hotel. Die Zimmer sind sehr gem√ºtlich und luxuri√∂s ausgestattet. Die Badezimmer schlicht und sehr modern eingerichtet. Der SPA ist nicht sehr gross daf√ºr hat man vom Pool aus einen tollen Blick auf die Stadt. Das Essen war hervorragend, das Personal sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.

Ficamos hospedados de 7 a 11 de setembro. A primeira surpresa foi um "Up grade" que n√£o nos agradou nem um pouco - reclamamos com a recep√ß√£o, tendo em vista que a su√≠te que nos ofereceram tinha dois ambientes o que tornava o quarto claustrof√≥bico, mas j√° n√£o era poss√≠vel fazer nada naquele dia. No dia seguinte nos mudaram de apto - este sim, com uma vista muito bonita, mas com detalhes de fazer chorar: 1) Sentado na cadeira na varanda vc n√£o consegue ver a vista (s√≥ plantas) - muito mal projetado 2) O apto tem mais corredor q √°rea √∫til 3) o vidro da varanda estava quebrado e ng n√£o deu nenhuma satisfa√ß√£o.Tivemos por motivos de sa√∫de que prorrogar nossa estada. A recepcao disse q n√£o havia mais aptos, apesar disso reservamos via Booking a mesma categoria de apto q est√°vamos - mesmo assim n√£o nos deixaram ficar no apto (meu companheiro estava sem andar) - ok, o gerente explicou q era uma fam√≠lia e entendemos. Colocaram-nos num apto praticamente sem janelas (virado para o pr√≥prio Predio) - aten√ß√£o a grande parte dos aptos s√£o assim! O apto no tinha banheira conforme reservamos pela Booking. O quarto tem itens de acabamento bonitos, um hall "redondo" que foi a √∫nica coisa que realmente impressionou, sistema td informatizado via iPad. O servi√ßo de room service e bar s√£o bons, o Roof Top tem atendimento atencioso e as massas "contempor√¢neas" s√£o boas. O menu degusta√ß√£o ou os pratos do restaurante "estrelado" n√£o valem nada, servi√ßo confuso, tumultuado, muito melhor o do bar ou pedir room service... Conclus√£o: Ainda bem que Giorgio Armani √© estilista, como hoteleiro n√£o funcionou ...

Ciao a tutti ho passato un fine settimana stupendo, hotel bellissimo con una attenzione al cliente direi quasi maniacale, camera medie dimensioni ben curata in tutto, la colazione di gran qualita' . Lo consiglio

Excellent hotel with everything one could dream of.  We had many other options yet we come back to the Armani every time. The location as well as the ambiance are unique and memorable. We tell our friends to stay at the Armani many still go to the mandarin for their parking situation and oriental style. We prefer the Armani.

It was a great stay at the hotel. Great design, best hotel in milano ! Rooms are spacious,luxury and everything is Armani. Who doesn't like Giorgio Armani ?! Look at the picture, you will love it when you experience it !

review_title: Probably the best value during Formula One Weekend
review_text: When room rates in Milan are hitting sky high prices because it's such a busy weekend, the Amani provided relatively good value for money.Unfortunately there were some imperfections but it was all round a decent, albeit still expensive stay.Check in - I was able to check in before the official check in time and the staff were very helpful in this regard.I was having difficulty booking tickets on an external website to go to the outlet mall.  A gentlemen staff member was very gracious in assisting me to book the ticket however I was surprised that they charge a 2 euro commission for this - based on my experience, concierge assistance making reservations and booking tickets is standard hotel service.  Given the room rate for this hotel, it's hard to feel like you're not being nickel and dimed when such a petty charge is directed at the guest.Staff at the front desk were mostly professional but I was disappointed to see a woman make a face to her colleague and gesture at luggage left for storage by another guest.  Ideally don't diss the guests but if you must, do it behind closed doors.Staff at the front desk later were quite difficult towards me when I arrived to ask to be pointed in the direction of the restaurant for my dinner reservation.  They asked me which restaurant and I said your two Michelin star restaurant.  They insisted that there was nothing in my notes about having a reservation and in any event all Michelin star restaurants were closed on Sundays.  Eventually they worked out that they were in the wrong and not only was their restaurant open, but I did have a reservation (there was almost no one there so I could have been seated anyway).  This was totally unnecessary had staff had any idea of what was going on in their own hotel - it's not like there are so many restaurants it's hard to keep track and being suspicious about what I was telling them without verifying whether I might be correct, was annoying.The room itself was nice enough with a good view out onto a church.  Like the Armani hotel in Dubai, the mini bar is complimentary which is a good perk.Spa: Treatments were good and price point was fair.  Unfortunately I had difficulty communicating to the nail technician that she had filed through my skin when removing semi permanent polish which left me with my skin sliced open on several of my fingers and the sting of pain when the nail polish remover was applied to the open wound was not pleasant at all.   I loved that the steam rooms were individual cabins - I have never seen that before!Restaurant: After finally making it inside, this was a pleasant enough place with good service.  This is just personal taste but I thought the food was overly salty so while it was a nice experience, I wouldn't go out of my way to return.Check out: Around 100 euros extra had been charged to my room.  The restaurant had made a mistake in allocating someone else's bill to me.  I had to point out that the signature was not mine at all - in addition to repeatedly saying, those aren't my drinks.A hotel of this caliber and this price point really should have less errors and staff who are 100% gracious towards guests.  While the stay was not terrible, I do hope that this feedback will help with the quality for future stays - when we save up for a vacation and throw loads of money down, it should be a special experience.

Tutto perfetto, ci siamo sentiti coccolati, personale cortese, pulizia buona e relax assicurato.Consigliamo  per chi fosse possibile di raggiungere l'hotel con i mezzi pubblici e non con la propria auto.

Hotel impeccabile. Professionalit√†,cortesia e disponibilit√† sono solo alcune delle caratteristiche dello staff a dir poco eccellente. L'hotel √® meraviglioso, come del resto tutte le opere del Sig. Armani. Cura dei dettagli, meticolosit√† ,cortesia e professionalit√† completano il quadro d'insieme.Essere ospite dell'hotel equivale a concedersi un periodo di coccole e cura per se stessi. Davvero meravglioso!

Hotel fantastico. Ottima posizione, di fronte via monteNapoleone. Personale cortese e gentilissimo. Lo consiglio a chi vuole passare un soggiorno fantastico spendendo  di pi√π. " ma li vale tutti!".....

I enjoyed the great services and the hotel cares about everything and the simplest things , the important thing is that the restaurant has got Michelin star. Next time when i come to Milan I'm gonna visit Armani Hotel

I love Armani but I can't stand thinking how that tall glass mirror fell off completely just to be supported by water faucet. I NEVER experienced this type of experience with other hotel. You do understand that this could be fatal, right. I think you need to invest in an excellent operation manager and start investing in high quality fixtures and contractor to manage your building.

Credo che possa definirsi - davvero - uno dei migliori alberghi nel quale abbia avuto il piacere di soggiornare, seppur per un breve periodo. Ci sono stata per una notte trovandomi a Milano per lavoro: la struttura √® impeccabile assieme al personale ed al servizio che riescono a dare una qualit√† indubbiamente altissima! Ho stuzzicato qualcosa di veloce al bar che riserva roba ottima e di qualit√†, dalle bevande al cibo! La SpA si √® confermata rigenerante, essendo situata in cima alla struttura e mostrando una vista di Milano mozzafiato e stranamente silenziosa! Anche le camere perfette ..se nn fosse che se sono dotate di un asciugacapelli ...inappropriato allo standard altissimo che l'Armanl hotel rivela in tutto il resto: un phon attaccato ad una presa e quindi utilizzabile esclusivamente nel bagno nei pressi dello specchio ma , soprattutto, un phon che funziona soltanto continuando a premere ( senza mai lasciarlo) il pulsante di accensione! 4 punti e nn 5 perch√© pur ribadendo l'ottimo giudizio su tutto il resto, alla luce della piccola critica, non posso ovviamente dare il massimo!

Lo stile dello stilista si respira in ogni aspetto e il soggiorno si trasforma in un esperienza.EccellenteSe ci arrivate in auto attenzione, il personale non √® molto attento, mi sono preso due multe....

review_title: A peaceful oasis in the middle of Milan
review_text: We had the most amazing stay at the Armani Hotel during the "1st May-Weekend"Two nights at the Armani felt like a four day holiday :-)The Gym and Spa area have a phenomenal view overlooking Milan city + sunset. What more can you ask for. We also enjoyed a great dinner which presented the best Risotto I have ever eaten. A big "thank you" to the bar man who spoiled us with a special Milan-cocktail. All in all a WONDERFUL stay. THANK YOU <3KR Vik

Its like a dream coming true , the life style ,the food and the room are a bove expectations.Personal are very friendly and do everything to please us.Location en facilities are super.The Armani store below is like a dream

Thanks so much to Fabrizio for the perfect massage..very competent and human..and fun. Please I would like to take him to Paris : ) . For me a good massage is the ultimate in luxury. Therapeutic for the body and especially for the soul.Perfect Hotel and beautiful SPA.

I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. The room is rather spacious esp in Milan standard. The deco is of a very modern style. The service was good and the staff was generally friendly, helpful and smart. The slippers provided were like a pair shoes and not that comfy and you may consider bringing your own. Also, no toothbrush provided , bring your own too.Do feel free to enjoy the snacks and drinks at the mini bar as , believe it or not , it is all complimentary!

Consiglio a tutti di andarci !!! Merita davvero la gentilezza e la pulizia non manca di sicuro !!!!! Io appena posso vado a trovarli fin da subito mi sono trovato bene ,  loro sanno come metterti a proprio agio e i prezzi non sono esageratissimi !!!!

L'Ambiente e' davvero unico e suggestivo! Una delle migliori viste su Milano godute all'interno di una piscina idro-massaggio pazzesca. Un ambiente calmo, silenzioso e molto accogliente con un servizio davvero professionale, dal car vallet al resto dello staff. Vado molto spesso per trattamenti post e pre gare (mezze maratone e trail) specialmente da Fabrizio ottimo osteopata-massaggiatore che in molto casi mi ha rimesso in sesto! Vi consiglio di prendervi un intero pomeriggio sabato o domenica per godere in toto della struttura.

review_title: Style design & service on the highest level
review_text: Welcome in Georgio's home! One step in this hotel and you enter the world of one Italia's greatests designers. Minimalism and yet cosy. Love the Spa. Perfect serve cocktails at the Bamboo bar. The best hotel in Milan!

review_title: One of the best Hotels in Milano
review_text: All in all , its a perfect Hotel , Price , service , friendly , welcoming, location .....etc. Luxury rooms , nice atmosphere , fantastic restaurant and cafes. prime location for luxury shopping. it was really a very nice experience.

Milan was our last stop and the Armani was a great choice.  The staff, location and amenities were topnotch.  It so happened that it was the 5th anniversary of the hotel, and we were graciously invited to join in the celebration at the bar.  Well appointed room with a balcony, complimentary mini bar with snacks, and a beautiful bathroom made our stay very memorable.  Just a little annoyance was the TV cabinet at the foot of our bed, kind of restricted movement in the room.

The hotel experience was very nice. I absolutely adored the design, provided bathroom things were all with Armani perfume and all included room bar. As well as I loved how big the bathroom was. Unfortunately the closet was very weird, it was less than a meter tall or something like that and even my boyfriends jackets couldn't hang fully, not even talking about my dresses... Also there weren't any space were to put our shoes so the nice design (absolutely my favorite was the hidden TV in a room and IPad music, light and etc. control available when you're already in bed) wasn't that comfortable for use. As well it took quite a long time to get our car even though we always called from the room to take it.

Super Design! Great location. Amazing service. Delicious breakfast. Wonderful SPA. Best linen and pillows ever had.Free minibar. Spoiling shower and bath. Big and comfortable room! Will be staying there again for sure. The only thing that didn't worked out well was the long waiting for the room to be prepared.

review_title: If you love design, you'd love Armani
review_text: I love how modern everything is. I stayed in a suite with my husband. It was so relaxing from lighting, colors and beautiful peppery frankincense smell, that you can not buy the lotion and shampoo in store. The bathroom floors were heated. The spa over looks the city and the massage absolutely topped up my experience with Armani. If you come to Milan this is the only hotel you should go for.

It was a very good experience. The hotel is very well located and the interior design is fantastic with a excelent staff: I am sure that i will repeat the experience in the future, but they should improve the quality of the restaurant.

Armani hotel is very quite yet elegant place. It is located in the middle of everywhere and everything in Milano. The Armani restaurante is a must visit. Also book yourself a treat at the spa for a pamper.

My stay at Armani was exceptional .The managers and staff were very helpful in many ways . We would certainly recommend the hotel in terms of the  facilities, room decor and position of the hotel which was excellent for shopping . I would rate this hotel as one of the very best that I have visited in terms of the freindly disposition of the staff.

review_title: Pior hotel que j√° fiquei na vida
review_text: Vim para Mil√£o a trabalho e escolhi o hotel Armani pela localiza√ß√£o e conforto. Selecionei um quarto que era mil euros mais caro do que o mesmo quarto com cama de casal, pois estava viajando com uma colega de trabalho e n√£o queriamos dormir juntas. Ao chegar, no quarto tinha 1 cama de casal onde eles apenas trocaram os len√ßois e chamaram aquilo de 2 camas. Conversei com o gerente e disse que nao entendia porque eles cobravam mais caro uma vez que nao era um quarto com duas camas. No fim, ele disse que nada podia fazer pois o hotel estava lotado. Ele acabou colocando uma bi cama, o que na minha cabe√ßa n√£o justifica os mil euros. Logo depois quis conhecer as facilidades do hotel como piscina e sala de ginastica e fui barrada na porta da piscina pois nao estava com trajes de banho e minha entrada iria constranger os h√≥spedes. Nunca vi tanta babozeira e tantos funcion√°rios mal educados na minha vida. Hotel caro com pessoas que tratam os h√≥spedes com pouco caso e falta de educa√ß√£o. N√£o indico!

I stayed at the Armani Milano in July, during our Italian trip, with my husband and son and, since we have entered the hotel, we started breathing luxury and style throughout it. The staff at the Front Desk and bellmen were absolutely amazing and treated our family like royalties. The room was unbelievably clean and the furniture reflected the perfect Armani style. My son also received a welcome bag with a toy and some other personalized items which he truly loved. THANK YOU all for making our stay the most memorable we ever had. We'll certainly come back.

Armani hotel Milano is the place to be when visiting Milan. I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. The ambience is to die for and the receptionists were really  helpfull on all my inquiries of how to get around. The location is superb and is close to the Duomo. Armani has one of the best bars and spa i have been to in my travels.Cant wait for my next visit to Milan!!!

Since the trip was about go seeing and buying, I decided to stay in Milan's Quadrilatero della Moda shopping district and stayed with Armani. The hotel comes with the panoramic views from the Duomo to Milan's beautiful architectures. Armani made me feel very classy, calm and vibrant at the same time. Love all staffs treatments here especially at the spa with steam bath and sauna after long day of spending (too much). Also a very relaxing time with nicely serenade live music at the Bamboo bar ;)

review_title: The best food we found in Milan
review_text: Superb food (we went for lunch), interesting cocktails, good views and helpful staff.  It even smells nice. The Tiramisu is so good it must have been crafted by Angels to God's own recipe! Not cheap but not ridiculous either. It's close to la Scala and il duomo so good location too.

simplement luxueux ! une prise en main de la tablette est n√©cessaire car toute la chambre se g√®re ainsi. Seul b√©mol, le spa qui est un peu d√©cevant avec un service basique mais sans plus... tr√®s bien situ√©, acc√®s direct au m√©tro et boutique ARMANI au rez-de-chauss√©e

Mi √® capitato un autista cordiale e simpatico !!!

Hotel di altissimo livello, camere bellissime, fornite di tutti i comfort! Personale professionale e discreto. Molto tecnologico, spa interna e ristorante. Situato in zona centralissima vicino alla vita di Milano. Consigliato per chi vuole viziarsi.

beautiful in every way, situated in the heart of the shopping district and presentation of the rooms and hotel was just beautiful.Big rooms and very homely with all amenities you require.  Toiletries were beautiful and breakfasts of first rate quality.Cannot fault the hotel or staff and the staff very attentive to your every need.Definitely my choice of hotel when I next visit Milan

I do so love spending time at the Armani Hotel in Milan. I spend a few days there in October 2015 and again in July 2016. What a pleasure. From the signature scent that greets you as you walk into the hotel, to the impeccably dresses staff members, the complimentary bar, the comfy bed and their delicious club sandwich (do give it a try!!!!).My friends and I had a blast!

Il servizio dell'hotel √© impeccabile. Sopra la media dei 5 stelle lusso di Milano. Hotel con materiali di pregio. Non manca nulla ed √© super tecnologico. (Usa la domotica nelle camere, inoltre si possono vedere film gratis ed il frigo bar il caff√© e l'acqua sono compresi, cosa rara anche nei 5 stelle). Complimenti

This was our first visit to Milan and there was no better place to stay than the Armani Hotel. We stayed for three nights and used all hotel facilities including the spa, restaurant and bar. Rooms were luxurious and spacious and staff were extremely friendly and welcoming throughout our stay. Overall this hotel was outstanding and I would definitely choose to go back if visiting Milan again!

Sehr gutes Hotel  gerade f√ºr den Mann ohne Begleitung... ein Hit... sehr angenehm u. niveauvoll in exquisiter Lage... die Garage h√§tte direkt im Haus sein k√∂nnen, war jedoch etwas weiter weg, durch den Service jedoch kein Problem nur teuer...

review_title: Amazing Luxury Hotel with Great Location
review_text: I have never been accommodated in such a beautiful hotel like this before. From the moment I entered the lobby until check out everything was first class service due to great and attentive staff, perfect facilities, super clean rooms and so delicious food.Thank you Armani Team.

De l'espace du service du confort CRT h√¥tel est certainement un des meilleurs spots pour qui aime descendre dans le centre de Milan et qui dispose des moyens pour s'offrir cet hotel font les chambres m√™me les plus petites sont d'un co fort quasi irr√©prochable . Attention toutefois il n'y z toujours pas de miroir grossissant d'as les salles de bain et il faut savoir vivre avec la domotique.,.

Merveilleux h√¥tel en plein centre de Milan....personnel toujours disponible chambre spacieuse et ultra moderne si vous aimez le luxe ....arretez vous au 31 rue Manzoni ps: faire une pause aussi au spa

Armani Hotel Milano is one of the BEST hotel experiences I've ever had. Amazingly high quality in every aspect, from check-in to check-out. Located centrally and a true inspiration in its design, service, professionalism and experience. Will definitely go back and also recommend to others.

Incredible hotel, incredible service. Never been in a hotel like it before. Little out of our price range but a friend got it for us. We thought it was going to be hard for the hotel to justify this price but it certainly came very close. The whole hotel was perfection and made a perfect getaway.

review_title: Ein Hotel mit italienischem Charme und amerikanischem Servicestandard
review_text: Die Lage des Hotels direkt am Beginn der Einkaufsmeile macht den Schaufensterbummel zum puren Vergn√ºgen. Die bewohnte Suite war auf sehr hohem Niveau, das Bad liess keine W√ºnsche offen. Das Hotelrestaurant kocht auf Sterneniveau und hat eine exzellente Weinkarte. Am meisten begeisterte aber der Service. Alle W√ºnsche wurden einem quasi von den Augen abgelesen und in unglaublicher Geschwindigkeit erf√ºllt!

Die Freundlichkeit des Personals, von der Lobby bis zum Door Personal, ist outstanding / Phantastisch. Die Lage und die Ausstattung lassen keine W√ºnsche offen. Design und Style des Hotels sind perfekt und der Wellnessbereich ist super. Alles in allem eines der besten Hotels in seiner Kategorie

review_title: Beautiful Hotel but staff with an attitude
review_text: The hotel has a very good location for metro and shopping.  Overall it was a great experience except that the room does not have a good sound proof as I was being arranged with a connecting room and I can hear the next door conversation.  Also the door was very heavy to open and you need special technique to open the door.  During my 4 days stay, seem like every time I need help to open the door. But overall is a fantastic hotel.

Very modern & minimalistic interior. However, the room type with the big TV console in front of the bed is very impractical, making the room small, avoid it. Front service & location very good. Bed is form but pillows are rather soft. Overall, an outstanding hotel with small glitches.

Un hotel raffinato, elegante e lussuoso, che offre ai suoi clienti un'esperienza indimenticabile....essendo al centro di Milano gode di ottima posizione e dispone di camere moderne, spaziose, tecnologiche e dotate di ogni comfort.....ristorante con vista panoramica, cucina creativa e cibo di alta qualit√†....personale molto competente, cortese e attento a soddisfare ogni minima richiesta del cliente....massima pulizia e cura del dettaglio anche nella spa e nell'area fitness....stile e atmosfera estremamente particolari...il profumo unico che ti accoglie all'ingresso e ti accompagna nei magnifici corridoi ti rester√† addosso per tutta la durata del soggiorno e anche oltre...

Wir waren vor zwei Wochenenden im Armani Hotel in Mailand. Zwar sind wir Erfahrene Mailand-Besucher, jedoch das erste Mal im Armani Hotel gebucht. Und garantiert auch das letzte Mal. Der Empfang unten durch den Portier war sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Das Check-In Personal hatte eine √úberheblichkeit und Arroganz an sich, die sich f√ºr ein solches Hotel nicht geb√ºhrt. Absolute Negativpunkte waren die nicht vorgenomme R√ºckmeldung bzgl einer erfolglosen Restaurantreservierung, so dass wir uns "spontan" am Samstagabend um einen Tisch bem√ºhen mussten. Gekr√∂nt wurde dieses nur noch durch das Vergessen meines Geburtstages. Da wir seit Jahrzehnten immer √ºber meinen Geburtstag verreist sind spreche ich hier aus Erfahrung: Es ist das erste Mal, dass weder eine Karte noch eine Aufmerksamkeit der des Hotels vorlag. Ein absolutes No-Go f√ºr ein 5 Sterne Hotel. Als "Icing on the cake" konnte man dann noch die unversch√§mte Parkgeb√ºhr iHv 65 Euro pro Tag bezeichen... Fazit: Mailand immer wieder gern, aber nicht mehr Armani. Hier gibt es deutlich service-orientiertere 5 Sterne Hotels in unmittelbarer N√§he.

Beds comfortable, spacious toilets, high tech rooms, but not enough lighting in the rooms and toilets. The F&B outlets' atmosphere is great but there's nothing special about the food. The staff is friendly and welcoming, and the hotel's location is strategical.Recommended.

fantastic and room facilities a great hotel view.good food service great shopping and romantic atmosfare.staff is well behave overall good value for money. happy journey to all it was nice being there the services they are providing .... good hold mode us feelcomfortable..............................
